Exercises Atlas.name: Exercises Atlas
Exercises Atlas.description: This web app helps find out new exercises for each muscle with some descripted information about it (general rules, instruction, video).

custom Crypto Currency.name: Custom Crypto Currency
custom Crypto Currency.description: This web app was created to simplify crypto currencies trades between themselfs.

Crypto Tracker.name: Crypto Tracker
Crypto Tracker.description: This web app allows to view the current cryptocurrency rates, clicking on which opens a menu with a real-time chart.

Favorite films.name: Favorite films
Favorite films.description: This web app fetch films from datebase API, then you able to add it to favorite, and in second tab switch movie state to watched. This project was creater for testing pinia functional.
